title: Number of U.S. patents held by tech companies in 2012
summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Number of U.S. patents in the y axis.
Company Samsung has the highest Number of U.S. patents and Amazon has the lowest Number of U.S. patents.
The difference of Number of U.S. patents between the highest and lowest Company is 47407.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of U.S. patents for 20 number of Companys.
The maximum Number of U.S. patents 47855.0 is found at Company Samsung and the minimum is found at Amazon where Company is 448.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Number of U.S. patents in the y axis.
Company Samsung has the highest Number of U.S. patents and Amazon has the lowest Number of U.S. patents.
The difference of Number of U.S. patents between the highest and lowest Company is 47407.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of U.S. patents for 20 number of Companys.
The maximum Number of U.S. patents 47855.0 is found at Company Samsung and the minimum is found at Amazon where Company is 448.0.
The Number of U.S. patents of Company Samsung is 106.82% larger than the minimum value at Amazon.
Number of U.S. patents at Company Samsung is 47855.0 , second place is Canon at 46322.0, and thirdly is Sony at 36508.0.
The Company Amazon tends to be 3.21 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Companys, we get total 297824.0.
